sentences.english: Tianjin Harbor construction and development is restricted seriously as the land of Nanjiang Port Area is insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 南疆港區陸域不足，已嚴重製約港口建設及功能開發。

sentences.english: This research provide reference evidence when we legitimately use resource in Nanjiang.
